lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Charges of public sector waste, corruption and neglect of agriculture have surfaced amid the compliments in debates at the annual session of China's parliament, the National People's Congress (NPC).

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: China's top entrepreneur Rong Yiren, chairman of the China International Investment and Trust Corporation (CITIC), who also represents Shanghai in the NPC, attacked the "profit before everything" mentality which he said led to theft, embezzlement and extravagant gifts and banquets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: She said there had been similar changes one year ago, when the Congress added words about the importance of ideological education and the need to help poorer provinces left behind in China's uneven march to greater prosperity.
